name: Lieutenant Williams
descriptions: Lieutenant Williams (named in-game as Enclave Officer) is an Enclave officer stationed at Raven Rock in 2277.

Williams is one of the only Enclave officers present at Raven Rock. He patrols the cell blocks in section 3A of the base. He may be ordered by President Eden to report to his commanding officer for reassignment, but he remains at his post for the duration of the Lone Wanderer's exploration.

topics.response_text: I guess you'd better be on your way... Sorry for the uhh, for the interruption.Play soundmq09_greeting_000bf7ce_1.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Mq09_greeting_000bf7ce_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: 500 caps says you never saw me. Understand?
Sure. You stay here while I get the caps. I'll be right back.
On second thought, you're not worth the caps.
Look, here are the caps. Let's just pretend we never saw each other.
I'm on my way up to see the President. How about I put in a good word for you?
topics.response_text: I, uhh... You are? I mean, you would?

topics.topic_text: Well then, I guess I'll just have to kill you.
Okay, I'm just going to slowly walk away now...
Whoa, whoa. Let's calm down. I'm supposed to be here.
topics.response_text: On who's authority? I have no records of that. You're supposed to be in a holding cell.

topics.topic_text: 10 caps says I can kill you before the guards get here.

topics.response_text: You will stand down and return to your cell at once. That's an order!

topics.topic_text: Your boss. So you'd better let me past before you get in trouble.
topics.response_text: Colonel Autumn is the only one authorized to see the President.

topics.topic_text: The President wants to speak to me in his office.
topics.response_text: What? No one sees the President except Colonel Autumn.

topics.topic_text: Take a hike, before you get squashed.
topics.response_text: I, uhh... I have somewhere else to be.
Lieutenant Williams. I'm ordering you to stand down at once.{shaky, scared}
I'm not listening to anything you have to say, prisoner! Stand down at once!{shaky, scared, trying to sound tough}

conversation.response_text: No way. Not on my watch. GUARDS!Play soundmq09_goodbye_0003c17e_1.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Mq09_goodbye_0003c17e_1.oggnoicon
